ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Outcome dialog for the Iron throne. Wyll gets reunited with Ravengard and they have an OM discussion. Should also explain how Ravengard is now protected by the Emperor's protection and he will be in camp after this.
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: Triggers automatically when you return from the Iron Throne, after the cinematic where the Submersible docks at the Dock Warehouse. Only if Wyll Avatar is present OR orphaned Wyll Companion is present.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM.synopsis: Outcome dialog for the Iron throne. Wyll gets reunited with Ravengard and they have an OM discussion. Should also explain how Ravengard is now protected by the Emperor's protection and he will be in camp after this.
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM.how_to_trigger: Triggers automatically when you return from the Iron Throne, after the cinematic where the Submersible docks at the Dock Warehouse. Only if Wyll Companion is present AND his bonded Avatar is present.

AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM.synopsis: Companion Wyll reminds the Avatar about saving his father who is imprisoned in the Iron Throne.
AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM.how_to_trigger: Triggers automatically after the IronThrone_Arrival dialog if Companion Wyll is present.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_16.text: *Calmness greets you upon exiting the submersible. Unlike the Iron Throne, you remain intact.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_22.text: *The same cannot be said for the Gondian hostages, however.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_6.text: *While the same cannot be said for most of the Gondian hostages, at least one of them survived.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_3.text: *Your chest tightens as your exhausted father approaches.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_7.text: He's tadpoled, but under my protection now, just like you. His mind is his own again.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_25.text: *Your tadpole resonates with your father's, and a flash of recognition sets in. The devil standing before him is his own son.*
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind meld for just this node

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_11.text: Wyll? Gods, it pains me to look at you. By Balduran's graces, why have the Hells ordained you to save me?

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Wyll
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_27.text: Father. I'm so pleased you're safe.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_26.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_26.text: By every last hell, son. I hate to see what you've become - but... nngh...
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ravegard grips his head, still recovering from his mind being overcome.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Wyll
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_12.text: I just saved your life. I was a fool to think you'd thank me.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_8.text: Fine, Wyll. You have my gratitude. But that doesn't mean... nngh...
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ravegard grips his head, still recovering from his mind being overcome.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_28.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_28.text: *Ravengard's head still aches so powerfully, the pain seeps into you. The Absolute may be silenced, but your father's parasite still remains.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_10.text: I'll guide him to your camp. He'll know where to go, even if he doesn't yet understand why.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_2.text: *Your father grows silent. Whatever needs saying will have to wait.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Wyll
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_4.text: I'm starting to think I should have let you die.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_13.text: Gods damn it, Wyll - have you saved me just to taunt me? My own son, one more devil to... nngh...
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ravegard grips his head, still recovering from his mind being overcome.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Wyll
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_14.text: Go to my camp and wait for me. I'll explain everything there.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_35.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_35.text: *Your tadpole resonates with your father's. He is a flurry of emotion, both grateful to see his son and angry at his return.*
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind meld for just this node

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_1.text: Wyll. By Balduran's graces, why have the Hells ordained you to save me?

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Wyll
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_0.text: Father. I'm so pleased you're safe.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_20.text: Then we're in agreement for once. Wyll, I... nngh...
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ravegard grips his head, still recovering from his mind being overcome.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_30.speaker: Wyll
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_30.text: Is that your way of saying 'thank you'?

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_29.text: Today, you have my gratitude. But I'm not ready to... nngh...
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ravegard grips his head, still recovering from his mind being overcome.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Wyll
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_15.text: Go to my camp and wait for me. I'll explain everything there.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_9.text: I'm sure you will. But I'm not ready to... nngh...
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ravegard grips his head, still recovering from his mind being overcome.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_18.text: *The same cannot be said for most of Gortash's hostages.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_32.text: *It seems most of the hostages from the Throne share your fate.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_24.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_24.text: *So, it seems, will the families of all the hostages rescued from the Throne.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_34.text: Your father is still tadpoled, but under my protection now, just like you. His mind is his own again.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_17.text: Wyll? Gods, it pains me to look at you. By Balduran's graces, why have the Hells ordained you to save me?

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Wyll
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_5.text: I know you have questions. But for now, I need you safe. Go to my camp. We'll talk soon enough.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_23.text: Very well. Until then, may Helm guide me.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_AOM_OOM_19.text: Wyll. By Balduran's graces, why have the Hells ordained you to save me?

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_25.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_25.text: *Calmness greets you upon exiting the submersible. Unlike the Iron Throne, you remain intact.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_3.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_3.text: *The same cannot be said for the Gondian hostages, however.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_26.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_26.text: *While the same cannot be said for most of the Gondian hostages, at least one of them survived.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_2.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_2.text: *The same cannot be said for most of Gortash's hostages.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_1.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_1.text: *It seems most of the hostages from the Throne share your fate.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_12.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_12.text: He's tadpoled, but under my protection now, just like you. His mind is his own again.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_19.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_19.text: Wyll? Gods, it pains me to look at you. By Balduran's graces, why have the Hells ordained you to save me?

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_9.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_9.text: *Your tadpole resonates with Ravengard's. The exhausted Grand Duke is a flurry of emotion.*
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind meld for just this node

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_4.speaker: Player
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_4.text: Have a heart - your son is a hero. We saved lives here today, including your own.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_22.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_22.text: By every last hell, son. I... nngh... my head...
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ravegard grips his head, still recovering from his mind being overcome.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_30.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_30.text: *Ravengard's head still aches so powerfully, the pain seeps into you. The Absolute may be silenced, but the duke's parasite still remains.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_8.speaker: Wyll
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_8.text: I know you have questions. Please, go to our camp - you'll be safe there. We'll talk soon enough.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_27.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_27.text: *Ravengard answers with silence. He and Wyll have much to discuss.*

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_24.speaker: Player
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_24.text: Have a heart - we just saved your life. Your son is a hero.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_23.speaker: Player
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_23.text: Grand Duke Ravengard. Glad to see you of your own mind.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_31.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_31.text: By every last Hell, I... nngh... my head...
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_31.context: NodeContext: Ravegard grips his head, still recovering from his mind being overcome.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_20.speaker: Player
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_20.text: You can work out your issues later. Go to our camp - the Absolute can't reach you there.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_28.speaker: Wyll
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_28.text: Please - I know you have questions. But for now, I need you safe. We'll talk soon enough.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_7.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_7.text: Wyll. By Balduran's graces, why have the Hells ordained you to save me?

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_16.speaker: Player
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_16.text: Your son is a hero. He saved lives today - including yours.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_32.speaker: Player
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_32.text: Your son is a hero. He saved your life today.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_5.speaker: Player
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_5.text: Grand Duke Ravengard. Glad to see you of your own mind.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_18.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_18.text: You have my gratitude, Wyll. But I'm not ready yet to... nngh...
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ravegard grips his head, still recovering from his mind being overcome.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_11.speaker: Player
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_11.text: The reunion will need to wait. Go to our camp - the Absolute can't reach you there.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_0.speaker: Duke Ulder Ravengard
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Ravegard grips his head, still recovering from his mind being overcome.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_15.speaker: Wyll
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_15.text: Please - I know we must talk. But for now, I need you safe. Go to our camp - we'll catch up there.

ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_10.speaker: Narrator
ReturnRavengard_OM_Wyll_COM_10.text: *So, it seems, will the families of all the hostages rescued from the Throne.*

AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_2.speaker: Wyll
AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_2.text: Hells - our time is short. My father is here, and by the living gods, I will free him.

AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_5.speaker: Player
AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_5.text: We should hurry, then. The entire place is flooding.

AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_4.speaker: Player
AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_4.text: We'll see. He's your father, not mine.

AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_8.speaker: Wyll
AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_8.text: Words of the cold-hearted. I beg you, do not let him suffer!

AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_7.speaker: Player
AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_7.text: He's infected, Wyll. Are you sure about this?

AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_6.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
AfterArrival_OM_Wyll_COM_6.text: Go. Retrieve the Duke. He may share in my protection.
